posts.post_content:
Looking to buy any and every T206 Cub in every back except for the insane ones (Brown Lenox, BL460, Red Hindu, Uzit, Drum), though I'm sure I'll probably cave for at least one example of each at the end of the project. 

Since I'll be buying roughly 400+ cards (if I succeed), I'm looking for cards in the Poor/Auth-VG++ range.   I don't care if they're trimmed, and all I prefer is that the fronts are presentable. I don't mind marks, miscuts, or small amounts of paper loss on the back. I would prefer them raw, as I'll be cracking them out anyways.

E-mail is best:

[url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]



.
A couple of you helped me add 10 more, so thank you for that. I'm at 60 of 394. Please let me know what you have available!

Nate,

I have a few complete sets including one with the Lundgren PD350 back and have been thinking about selling them off.  Mostly low to mid grade.  I'm too busy to keep up with my messages so just call and we can discuss.  843-699-4006

Eric
Thanks Eric. I'll do so this weekend.
I have a few severely undergraded ones and a few others that have had the creases pressed out. Will send you an email. Please don't delete it immediately and then erase your hard drive.

LOL!

Look, just because you made me a lowball offer for all of my Cubs T206s, it doesn't mean you have to sabotage my thread. Agenda much? ;)

Antsy to add some more!

I'm at 155/400
